subsection_content:
According to urologists, there are a number of recommended measures to limit the risk of infection such as:
Have safe sex; Clean private areas before and after sex; Drink plenty of water (2-3 liters per day); Urinate as soon as you feel the urge; Avoid hot spicy foods, alcohol, stimulants...; Build a healthy lifestyle, exercise appropriately, eat lots of green vegetables; Limit sitting for long periods of time and avoid playing sports that put pressure on the prostate
Center for Urology and Nephrology, Tam Anh General Hospital system brings together a team of leading experts, Internal Medicine and Surgery, highly skilled and dedicated. Center Director - Meritorious Physician Assoc. Prof. Dr. Vu Le Chuyen, Deputy Director - Meritorious Physician Associate Professor II Ta Phuong Dung, Head of the Department of Urology - Dr. Nguyen Hoang Duc... are great trees in the field of Urology and Nephrology in Vietnam.
The Center's experts and doctors are always confident in mastering the latest techniques, early detecting and effectively treating kidney and urinary tract diseases, helping patients shorten hospital stays and limit risk of recurrence, improving quality of life.
Equipped with the leading modern machinery and equipment systems in the country and the region; Operating room meets international standards; Along with a 5-star boarding area and high-class service... The Urology and Nephrology Center stands out with examination, screening and treatment services for all urinary tract diseases. From common surgeries to major high-tech surgeries.
These include laparoscopic kidney stone surgery, kidney transplant, tumor resection to preserve kidney parenchyma; Radical nephrectomy; Radical prostatectomy; total bladder resection and small bowel cystoplasty; adrenalectomy; shaping urinary tract defects...
To schedule an appointment for prostatitis examination with leading experts at the Center for Urology and Nephrology, Tam Anh General Hospital System, you can make an appointment online through the following ways:
+ Call hotline 0287 102 6789 (HCMC) or 024 3872 3872 (Hanoi) to register for a private medical appointment with a specialist, through customer service staff.
+ Register for a medical appointment with any doctor you trust at the link: https://tamanhhospital.vn/danh-cho-khach-hang/dat-lich-kham/
+ Send a message on Tam Anh General Hospital Fanpage or Tam Anh General Hospital Urology and Andrology Fanpage
+ Text message via Zalo OA of Tam Anh General Hospital.
Prostatitis is one of the diseases that can occur in middle-aged men. The disease belongs to a sensitive part, so patients are often afraid to go to the doctor, leading to complicated complications. Therefore, urologists advise patients to see a doctor as soon as possible to help with effective treatment and avoid affecting the patient's reproductive health and quality of life.
